periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Rain and patchy fog. Cloudy. High near 37, with temperatures falling to around 34 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Light Rain Likely then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: Rain likely and patchy fog before 7pm, then widespread drizzle and patchy fog between 7pm and 9pm, then patchy drizzle and patchy fog and a slight chance of freezing drizzle between 9pm and 10pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 21, with temperatures rising to around 25 overnight. Northwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 30, with temperatures falling to around 28 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 17. Northeast wind around 3 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 40. East southeast wind 2 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 35. South southeast wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a high near 50. South southeast wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Rain then Chance Rain And Snow
periods.detailedForecast: Rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms before midnight, then a chance of rain and snow. Cloudy, with a low around 26. North northwest wind 6 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 30. Northwest wind 14 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 11. North northwest wind 5 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Washington's Birthday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 29. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 19. East northeast wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 31. Northeast wind around 8 mph. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Cloudy, with a low around 16. North northeast wind around 10 mph. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
